meanings.def: a shop that sells food and other things used in the home. In American English ‘grocery store’ is often used to mean ‘supermarket’.
food and other goods sold by a grocer or at a supermarket
examples: He walked in and set the bag of groceries down on the floor.
Mom wanted me to get the groceries.

meanings.def: connected with food and other goods sold by a grocer or at a supermarket
examples: I have to do some grocery shopping.
